name: Generic Space Shooter Nº2
description:
•Pilote and Upgrade your ship to beat the four worlds in this GameBoy like game while try to still alive on this hard stages.

•I made this game to test and learn some mechanics for a big and future project, since I'm still a beginner, so enjoy this game I made whit love  :)

•And the game don't have any sound, so pick any music that you like and enjoy.

•Big resolution cause a weird glitch texture, so i disable these in Options
